society.books.almanac.name: Farmer's Almanac
society.books.almanac.landing_text: Your guide to crops and farm animals. This is a work in progress and most crops are not listed.
society.books.fish_finder.name: Fish Finder
society.books.fish_finder.landing_text: The wettest guide you'll ever find, telling you the secret locations of every fish.
advancements.husbandry.ride_sled_fast.de: Ride a sled down a slope

advancements.husbandry.wrench.descriptio: Use a Block Wrench to rotate a block
effect.relics.stun.description: Disables everything except the escape button.
effect.relics.paralysis.description: Disables movement and the left and right mouse button special functions.
effect.relics.vanishing.description: Grants invisibility and slightly increases movement speed.
effect.relics.bleeding.description: Inflicts lethal percent damage over time.
effect.vinery.trippy.description: Applies a random visual effect to the target's view.
effect.vinery.jellie.description: Bestows potent blessings and heightened restorative properties.
effect.vinery.magnet.description: Causes nearby items to be pulled towards the affected target.
effect.vinery.teleport.description: Teleports target a few blocks ahead of where they were looking.
effect.vinery.creeper_effect.description: Causes target to explode at the end of the effect.
effect.vinery.water_walker.description: Grants the ability to walk on water.
effect.vinery.lava_walker.description: Grants the ability to walk on lava.
effect.vinery.double_jump.description: Increases jump height and grants the ability to double jump.
effect.vinery.staggering.description: Randomly shakes the camera and the target's movement.
effect.vinery.frosty_armor.description: Increases armor, increases attack damage, decreases movement speed, and applies the freezing effect.
effect.vinery.party_effect.description: Launches a firework when target hits an entity.
effect.vinery.climbing_effect.descriptio: Grants the ability to climb all blocks like a ladder.
effect.vinery.resistance_effect.descript: Increases armor toughness and knockback resistance.
effect.vinery.armor_effect.description: Increases armor toughness and armor level.
effect.vinery.improved_regeneration.desc: Grants regeneration and increases maximum health.
effect.vinery.improved_water_breathing.d: Grants water breathing and increases swimming speed.
Craft an Crystalarium to grow gems and minerals... Somehow.
Craft a Charging Rod to make Batteries from thunderstorms.
society.advancement.obtain_espresso_mach: Craft an Espresso Machine to live out your barista dreams.
society.advancement.obtain_artisan_hoppe: Craft an Artisan Machine for automatically filling and harvesting from Artisan Machines.
Craft an Auto-Grabber to collect products from Farm Animals harmlessly.
society.advancement.obtain_seed_maker.de: Craft a Seed Maker to turn any crop into seeds.
society.advancement.obtain_mayonnaise_ma: Craft a Mayonnaise Machine to make Mayonnaise for profit! Or drinking...
Craft an Artisan Cheese Press for turning Milk into Cheese.
society.advancement.obtain_loom.descript: Craft an Artisan Loom to craft more complex fabrics.
society.advancement.obtain_loom.title: Couturier
society.advancement.obtain_recycling_mac: Craft a Recycling Machine to turn trash into... Slightly usuable goods.
society.advancement.obtain_aging_cask.de: Craft an Aging Cask to age various goods, multiplying their value over long periods of time.
society.advancement.obtain_preserves_jar: Craft a Preserves Jar to turn crops into higher value Preserves.
society.advancement.obtain_tapper.descri: Craft a Tapper to collect resources from Trees.
society.advancement.obtain_tapper.title: Mon Bazou
society.advancement.obtain_prismatic_sha: Find a Prismatic Shard in the Skull Cavern or a max level skill.
society.advancement.obtain_jade.descript: Venture into the Skull Cavern and obtain Jade, the final tier of common crafting material.
society.advancement.obtain_jade.title: Entrana's Elegance
society.advancement.obtain_fire_quartz.d: Enter then Nether and find Fire Quartz, a common crafting material.
society.advancement.obtain_earth_crystal: Obtain an Earth Crystal, a common crafting material.
society.advancement.obtain_sparkstone.de: Obtain Sparkstone, used for automating certain aspects of your farm.
society.advancement.obtain_prismatic_coi: Obtain your first Prismatic Coin. How will you spend it?
Obtain your first Ancient Coin. Don't lose it...
society.advancement.obtain_sun.title: Seed Money
society.advancement.root.description: Start your farm, lay claim to riches.
society.advancement.root.title: Society: Sunlit Valley
command.society.pig_race.no_active: No Pigracing in progress! Purchase a Multiplayer ticket from a Banker!
command.society.pig_race.invalid_pig: You can only bet on these colors: red, blue, yellow, or green
command.society.pig_race.no_bet: Place Gold Coins or higher in your offhand to bet
command.society.pig_race.success: %s joined the pig race with %s ¬ßf‚óè¬ßr on %s!
society.pig_race.multiplay.start:
%1$s started a pig race with %2$s ¬ßf‚óè¬ßr on %3$s!
Type ¬ß6/pigrace <pig>¬ßr with %2$s ¬ßf‚óè¬ßr worth of coins
or more in your offhand to join!
society.pig_race.multiplay.started: Pig race starting! Bets total to %s!
society.pig_race.multiplay.cancelled: Pig race cancelled! Multiple bets are required to start...
society.pig_race.multiplay.in_progress: There's already a pig race happening! Type /pigrace <pig> to join!
society.pig_race.need_coin: Place gold coins or higher in your offhand to bet money on your pig!
society.pig_race.need_to_select_pig: Left click to select pig to bet on
society.hospital_receipt.title: Hospital Receipt
society.hospital_receipt.author: Sunlit Valley Hospital
society.hospital_receipt.first_death:
Sunlit Valley Hospital

Welcome to Sunlit Valley! Someone brought you in, looks like you got knocked out! Normally we charge a small fee for treatment, but since it's your first time we've treated you free of charge.

Take care next time!
society.hospital_receipt.fee_taked:
Sunlit Valley Hospital

Looks like you passed out again! We've treated you for a small fee.

We've taken it out of your bank account for convenience. Be careful next time!

:coin: %s paid.
society.hospital_receipt.debt:
Sunlit Valley Hospital

Looks like you passed out again! You didn't have enough in your bank account to cover the fee, so we'll take :coin: %s out of your profits until the fee is paid off. Be careful next time!

Debt: :coin: %s
society.animal_bed.not_enough_room: Not enough room to place this Barn Bed
society.blaze_banker.break: If block doesn't break, right click with a pickaxe.
society.blaze_banker.break.not_empty: Empty out ID cards and bank account money! Right click with a pickaxe.
society.shipping_bin.offline: This is a stranger's Shipping Bin. They aren't online to draw stats from...
society.compacting_drawer.quality_item: Quality items can't be inserted into Compacting Drawers
society.bone_meal.weak: Bonemeal is too weak to grow this...
society.chest_upgrade.void_warn: This chest cannot be upgraded while full.
society.planting_crop.eternal_summer: This Biome is always treated as Summer for planted crops.
society.planting_crop.eternal_winter: This Biome is always treated as Winter for planted crops.
society.skull_cavern.prevent_block_place: A magical force prevents you from placing this...
society.skull_cavern.too_late: It's too late at night to enter the Skull Cavern...
society.skull_cavern.fainted: You fainted in the Skull Cavern...
society.skull_cavern.intro: A strange person hands you a note and vanishes...
society.skull_cavern.intro.note.title: A Warning
society.skull_cavern.intro.note.author: someone...
society.skull_cavern.intro.note:
The Skull Cavern is a dangerous pit you can descend by finding ropes under ores and boulders.

It'll drain the life out of you if you stay in it too late.

Use that Escape Rope I gave you to get out before 5AM...
society.skull_cavern.invalid_dimension: This block doesn't work in this dimension
society.husbandry.bed_lost: %s got too far from its bed...
society.husbandry.mechanization: Its mind was corrupted and no longer gifts Prismatic Shards...
society.husbandry.emancipation: Its mind was healed from being a souless machine!
society.husbandry.action.need_milk_pail: You need a Milk Pail to milk this animal...
society.husbandry.action.young: %s is too young to produce milk!
society.husbandry.action.hungry: %s is too hungry to produce milk!
society.husbandry.breeding.need_potion: This animal can only be bred with a Miracle Potion!
society.husbandry.breeding.cooldown: This animal needs time to rest after taking a Miracle Potion...
society.fishing_rod.on_deployer: This machine will break my rod...
society.ender_eye.no_end: The End does not seem to exist in Sunlit Valley...
society.endless_entrana.text.3: It would be dangerous to go any further...
society.endless_entrana.text.5: On April 14th, 1912, the famous ocean liner known as the Titanic crashed into an iceberg. After remaining afloat for two hours and forty minutes, it sank beneath the waters of the North Atlantic. I will give you more time. Nine Hours. That is the time you will be given to make your escape.
society.endless_entrana.text.6: You have a long road ahead...
society.endless_entrana.text.7: But there's a prize at the end
society.endless_entrana.text.8: There's more where that came from!
society.endless_entrana.text.9: Unlimited money comes to those that smoke Entrana Greens...
society.endless_entrana.text.10: Place a Prismatic Coin in your offhand as an offering while smoking... Maybe it will be recognized...
society.starting_item_sharestone.title: Server Welcome
society.starting_item_sharestone.author: Society
society.starting_item_sharestone.text:
Welcome!

Thanks for taking part in a Sunlit Valley Multiplayer Server! You've been given a White Sharestone to make traveling to other bases easier. Please be sure to claim your base before placing it!
jei.society.working_block_entity.item: Hover over items for more info.
tooltip.society.skill_book.use: Right click to learn this skill!
tooltip.society.recall_potion: Teleports you to your spawn location
tooltip.society.phone: Can call all unlocked villagers to trade with them.
tooltip.society.diy_workbench: Crafts any Catalog item for cheap
tooltip.society.furniture_catalog:
Right click with %s %s
to purchase 1 %s.
Shift + Right click to bulk purchase
tooltip.society.hammer_core: Crafts hammers that mine a %s area
tooltip.society.plant_on_farmland: Will only grow when planted on farmland
tooltip.society.not_work_on_farmland: Does not work on farmland crops
tooltip.society.bank_meter: Shows balance in Bank Terminal when worn in curio slot
tooltip.society.trading_post: Trade with all nearby villagers in one place
tooltip.society.weak_fertilizer: Decreases time it takes for crop to mature by 1 day
tooltip.society.strong_fertilizer: Decreases time it takes for crop to mature by 2 days
tooltip.society.hyper_fertilizer: Decreases time it takes for crop to mature by 3 days
tooltip.society.hydrating_fertilizer: Keeps farmland watered until crop is half grown (rounded down)
tooltip.society.bountiful_fertilizer: Crops have a 25%% chance to drop 1 extra when harvested
tooltip.society.bountiful_fertilizer.war: Crops can no longer have quality
tooltip.society.low_quality_fertilizer: Increases the chance of quality crops on harvest
tooltip.society.high_quality_fertilizer: Greatly increases the chance of quality crops on harvest
tooltip.society.pristine_quality_fertili: Supremely increases the chance of quality crops on harvest
tooltip.society.handbell: Calls non-sitting pets and allays to you when rung
tooltip.society.pitchfork.warn: Does not work on Hydrating Farmland
tooltip.society.silo.tip: Can be expanded to a max of 3x9x3
tooltip.society.master_cooking_pot: Only a villager workstation, has no recipes
tooltip.society.skull_cavern_ore: Spawns exclusively in the Skull Cavern
tooltip.society.cheese_stick: Made in Fondue with cheese and bread
tooltip.society.cheese_form: Turns Large Milks into Cheese Wheels using Rennet
tooltip.society.liltractor:
Shift + Right Click to view inventory
Space while riding to change modes
Dyeable
tooltip.society.food_plate: Displays certain Farmer's Delight foods as blocks
tooltip.society.slime_ticket: Use on an a Splendid Slime to learn their primary breed's favorite food.
tooltip.society.slime_candy: Feed to a Splendid Slime to greatly increase their happiness.
tooltip.society.slime_feeder: Feeds nearby Splendid Slimes automatically. Handles tricky traits such as 'Picky' when applicable.
tooltip.society.slot_machine: Right click with any legal tender
tooltip.society.statue_endless_fortune: Gives a valuable item once a day
tooltip.society.gatcha_machine: Right click with an %s to purchase a Plushie Capsule
tooltip.society.greenhouse_glass: Grows the first crop underneath in any season
tooltip.society.trash_bin: Deletes any items you click into it
tooltip.society.trash_bag: Created from trashing items in a Bin
tooltip.society.time_sand_pouch: REMOVED!! CORRUPTS WORLD WHEN USED ON ARTISAN MACHINES
tooltip.society.extractinator:
Right click with a geode to process
Shift + Right click to process stack
tooltip.society.item_pipe: Can be configured to extract using the Create mod Wrench
tooltip.society.chunk_loader: Removed! Craft into money for your refund.
tooltip.society.evaporator: Place next to water to make salt
tooltip.society.rich_soil:
Grows colonies from red and 
brown mushrooms planted on it
tooltip.society.sprinkler:
Waters crops before they dry out at 6am
Can be given a stick for decoration
tooltip.society.temporarily_remove_door: Temporarily removed due to breaking worlds when on a Create Contraption
tooltip.society.magic_mirror_incompatibl: Does not work with Magic Mirror!
block.society.fish_pond.description:
Cultivates fish, roe, and various items
Right Click with a fish to add it to the pond
Shift + Right Click with an empty hand to take one out
block.society.fish_pond.description.plac: Needs a 3x4 of water behind pond
block.society.fish_pond.pond_is_empty: This Fish Pond is Empty! Right click with a fish to place it in the pond.
block.society.fish_pond.cross_type_fish: üêü: We don't like that fish here...
block.society.fish_pond.fish_quest: üêü: We'd feel more at home with %s of these:
block.society.fish_pond.not_valid: Not a valid Fish pond! Requires a 3x4 pond behind it without adjacent Fish Ponds to work. Nether fish need a lava pond.
block.society.coop_bed.description: Houses a farm animal, allowing it to have a higher maximum affection
block.society.coop_bed.description.tip: Only certain animals like this bed!
block.society.tapper.too_many_tapper: Too many Tappers attached to this log!
block.society.tapper.invalid_block: This block cannot be tapped for resources!
block.society.ribbit_hut.not_enough_room: Not enough room to place ribbit hut!
block.society.ribbit_hut.break: Break the door to demolish the Ribbit Hut
item.society.froggy_helm.description: There's a large tongue nestled inside
item.society.ribbit_drum.description: Nitwit Ribbits love to bang on this
item.society.holy_symbol.description: A tribute from a higher power
item.society.source_gem.description: Derived from a Gold Sea Coin
item.society.spider_silk.description: Meticulously textured by a Nerdy Spider
item.society.wheel_of_adaptation.descrip: Was once used to summon a beast
item.society.perfect_cherry.description: It wants you to eat it
item.society.production_science_pack.des: What was it used to research?
item.society.beemonican_seal.description: From the lost city of Beemonica
item.society.steamy_gadget.description: An ancient handheld computer powered by steam. The word 'Uni' is ingraved on the back
item.society.amulet_of_light.description: A very normal and holy pendant
item.society.princess_hairbrush.descript: Scuffed from being used to hit someone
item.society.animal_fancy.description: Increases affection gained from petting farm animals.
item.society.hitting_hard_and_soft.descr: Melee attacks do an extra 4 damage.
item.society.canadian_and_famous.descrip: Tappers output double. Doesn't affect Auto-Tappers.
item.society.first_aid_guide.description: Halves the maximum fee and debt from death.
item.society.intro_to_algorithms.descrip: Mining Lead ore no longer causes Brain Damage clouds.
item.society.no_name_for_the_sheep.descr: Naming animals grants an additional heart of affection.
item.society.slime_contain_protect.descr: Incubating a Slime Heart has a chance to give you a Slime Ticket.
Artisan Hoppers have a chance to not consume Sparkstone when harvesting. The chance increases the longer the product took to make.
item.society.debt_caverns.description: Fainting in the Skull Cavern no longer costs a fee or adds to debt.
item.society.phenomenology_of_treasure.d: Artifacts and Relics are worth 200%% more
item.society.frogs_bounty_bazaar.descrip: Prize Tickets give double the prizes.
item.society.bullfish_jobs.description: The quality of fish taken out of Fish Ponds scales with population.
item.society.wuthering_logs.description: Trees have a 15%% chance to drop Fire Logs when chopped.
item.society.universal_methods_of_farmin: The Market sells all basic seeds in every season.
item.society.ancient_cog.description: Use on a %s to give it a 5%% chance of producing an Ancient Fruit Seed
item.society.pink_matter.description: Use on an %s to make it auto-age Cheese Wheels.
item.society.pink_matter.description.war: Does not carry over Milk Quality
item.society.stone_hand.description: Use on a %s to decrease input amount by 2
item.society.broken_clock.description: Use on an %s to decrease aging time by half
item.society.sea_biscut.description: Use on a %s to double chance of non-Roe items
item.society.black_opal.description: Use on a %s to give it a 10%% chance of producing pristine items
item.society.enkephalin.description: Use on a %s to give it a 5%% chance of producing Supreme Mayonnaise
item.society.tiny_gnome.description: Use on a %s to give it a 25%% chance of producing rare furniture
item.society.ancient_roe.description: Use on a %s to double output
item.society.frosted_tip.description: Use on a %s to work and triple output in winter
item.society.infinity_worm.description: Use on a %s to let it work without inputs
item.society.inserter.description: Use on an %s to let it process 4 items at a time
item.society.cordycep.description: Use on a %s to double mushroom output
item.society.fish_rader.description: Shows catchable fish at the current time and location
item.society.magic_rope.description: Teleports you down a level in the Skull Cavern
item.society.magic_rope.description.warn: Make sure you're carrying an Escape Rope in case you get stuck...
item.society.magic_rope.invalid_dimensio: This can only be used in the Skull Cavern
item.society.magic_rope.no_room_below: There isn't a cave below you...
item.society.magic_rope.no_room_side: There isn't a cave close enough...
item.society.magic_tunnel.description: Teleports you to the nearest cave in the direction of the block you've clicked in the Skull Cavern
item.society.garden_pot.description: Grow crops indoors during any season. Cannot be watered with Sprinklers
item.society.garden_pot.description.tip: Can be upgraded with Deluxe Hydrating Fertilizer and hung from chains and ropes
item.society.warped_milk.description: Milked from Wooly Cows that spawn in Warped Forests
item.society.fine_wool.description: Collected from happy Sheep and Rabbits
item.society.truffle.description: Foraged by certain farm animals such as pigs
item.society.animal_feed.description: Feeds farm animals manually or using Feeding Troughs
item.society.candied_animal_feed.descrip: Increases affection by a full heart
item.society.mana_feed.description: Increases affection more than basic Animal Feed
item.society.animal_feed_sack.descriptio: Too large to feed farm animals manually or using Feeding Troughs
item.society.magic_shears.description:
Harvests drops from farm animals
with only a little discomfort!
item.society.friendship_necklace.descrip: Used with the "Best Friends Forever" Husbandry skill
item.society.frozen_tear.description: Found in Slush. Chance increased with fortune
item.society.prize_ticket.description: Use on an a Prize Machine for something good!
item.society.relic_trove.description: Can be opened using an Extractinator
item.society.geode_buster.description: Right click with geode in offhand
item.society.dragontooth_axe.description: Will break if wielded by one without the Dragonslayer skill
item.society.dragontooth_axe.no_skill_br: Your Dragontooth Axe broke, only a Dragonslayer can wield it...
item.society.ocean_jelly.description: Fished up in Ocean & Beach biomes
item.society.geode.description: Something's inside! A Blacksmith can help break it open.
item.society.car_key.description: Right click on an Automobile to park inside the key
item.society.car_key.use_on_drunk: I've had too much to drink, I should call a cab...
item.society.pig_race_ticket.description:
¬ß6Left click ¬ß7to select pig to bet on
¬ß6Right click ¬ß7with bet in offhand to start
item.society.magnifying_glass.descriptio: Displays working area of some machines
item.society.overflow_token.description:
Permanantly adds %s
to your coin leaderboard score,
bypassing the bank account's cap.
item.society.book_of_stars.description: Right click to gain experience in all skills
item.society.enriched_bone_meal.tree_fru: This tree only bears fruit in %s!
item.society.crystal_of_regret_farming.f: You aren't high enough level to use this!
